mapper.select: SELECT id,username,password FROM sysuser WHERE username=#{username}
SELECT sa.au_name FROM sysauthority sa,sysuser su,user_role ur,role_authority ra WHERE su.username=#{username} AND su.id=ur.user_id AND ur.role_id=ra.role_id AND ra.authority_id=sa.id
SELECT ot.sec_type FROM user_organ uo,sysuser u,organ o,organ_type ot WHERE uo.user_id=u.id AND u.username=#{username} and uo.organ_id=o.id AND o.organ_type_id=ot.id
SELECT count(1) FROM sysuser u,sysrole r,user_role ur WHERE u.id=ur.user_id and r.id=ur.role_id
